title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2.1 - Pier superintendents and hiring agents required to be licensed; employment of unlicensed pier superintendents and hiring agents prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2.1 - Pier superintendents and hiring agents required to be licensed; employment of unlicensed pier superintendents and hiring agents prohibited

State Regulations

No person shall act as a pier superintendent or as a hiring
agent within the Port New York District without first having obtained from the
commission a license to act as such pier superintendent or hiring agent, as the
case may be, and no person shall employ or engage another person to act as a
pier superintendent or hiring agent who is not so licensed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
